column4: i've just installed server 6.06, is there a way for me to change the console font, the screen is trailing off the edge of my 15" monitor (which obviously doesnt seem to support the default console font/resolution properly)
...its also an lcd monitor and the 'auto' button doesnt work for some reason
have a look at the bottom of this page to change resolutions https://wiki.ubuntu.com/FrameBuffer
set the framebuffer to your LCD monitors native resolution
